channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Computer Science Johns Hopkins University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: FuseMoE: Mixture-of-Experts Transformers for Fleximodal Fusion
item.description: FuseMoE, a novel mixture-of-experts transformer, efficiently fuses diverse and incomplete multimodal data, achieving superior predictive performance via a unique Laplace gating function.
